episodes.title: From Indoctrination to Freedom: One Pastor's Journey Out of the IFB
episodes.description: Have you ever felt trapped by religion? In this raw and unfiltered interview, we sit down with JC Groves, a brave pastor who escaped the clutches of the Independent Fundamental Baptist (IFB) movement. From a life of strict religious indoctrination to a powerful spiritual awakening, JC’s story will challenge everything you think you know about faith. We'll uncover the secrets of the IFB's legalistic practices, hear breathtaking stories of personal transformation, and reveal the man-made rules often disguised as biblical truth. If you've been hurt by religious control or are questioning your own faith journey, this video is a beacon of hope. Join us as JC shares his new mission with the 'Following the Way Podcast,' dedicated to helping you build an authentic relationship with Jesus, free from the burdens of religious tradition. Don't just listen—be transformed. Like, share, and subscribe to get your spiritual freedom back! #ReligiousTrauma #SpiritualAwakening #IFB #IndependentFundamentalBaptist #Exvangelical #Christianity #Christian #Podcast #FaithJourney #ReligiousFreedom #Jesus #Legalism

episodes.title: Season Finale! From Hymns to Headbanging: Breaking Free from Strict Church Rules
episodes.description: Ready for a trip down memory lane that's anything but holy? Join Jenny and her special guest Johnna as they spill all the tea on their crazy journey growing up in the Independent Fundamental Baptist (IFB) church. It's a hilarious look at everything you weren't allowed to do, especially when it came to music. Imagine a world with only hymns, strict dress codes, and zero rock and roll. Now picture what happens when two kids break free and discover a whole new universe of sound. From surviving awkward moments at tent revivals (yes, grasshoppers are involved!) to sneaking out for their first rock concert, this episode is a laugh-out-loud tale of rebellion and discovery. But it's not all fun and games. Jenny and her guest Johnna get real about navigating the lasting effects of religious trauma and how music became their ultimate escape. If you've ever felt trapped by strict church rules, this is the story you need to hear. It's relatable, liberating, and proves you can find your own rhythm, even after a lifetime of strict rules. #ChurchMusic #ReligiousTrauma #IFB #Exvangelical #Exchristian #RockMusic #MusicJourney #ReligiousFreedom #FaithDeconstruction #Storytime Don't miss out on this incredible story of music, freedom, and finding your own way! https://www.tiktok.com/@lukesevereid/video/7337046668073782570?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc&web_id=7541462327490381367

episodes.title: They Called It ‘Healing’ — She Calls It Hell: A Survivor’s Shocking Story
episodes.description:
In this powerful and emotional episode of Unholier Than Thou, hosts Susie and Jenny welcome a courageous survivor—A—who is breaking her silence on the horrifying abuse she endured at Shenandoah Haven, one of many institutions in the troubled teen industry.
A shares her story of being sent away without consent, subjected to emotional, physical, and religious abuse, and ultimately surviving a system that protects predators and punishes the vulnerable. From the "Porn Pastor" to the church's twisted justice system, this episode pulls back the curtain on an industry cloaked in secrecy.
🛑 This is a must-hear episode for anyone who wants to understand the hidden horrors behind “rehabilitation” programs and why survivors like A are demanding real change.
👉 Subscribe for more survivor stories
⚠️ Trigger Warning: This episode contains accounts of abuse, exploitation, and trauma. Please listen with care.
🔗 #TroubledTeenIndustry #SurvivorStory #AbuseAwareness #LegislativeChange #CommunitySupport #ExposeTheTruth #ReligiousTrauma #ShenandoahHaven

episodes.title: Church Control & Secrets: Barb's SHOCKING Escape to Freedom!
episodes.description:
⚠️ TRIGGER WARNING: This episode contains sensitive discussions of religious trauma, sexual abuse, and miscarriage. Listener discretion is advised.
Imagine a life defined by unyielding control and harsh judgment. This week on "The Process of Healing," hosts Susie and Jenny sit down with the incredibly brave Barb, who shares her harrowing, unfiltered story of being raised within a rigid, cult-like religious environment.
Barb pulls back the curtain on her tumultuous past, from the intense dynamics of her upbringing in Temple Baptist to the seismic church split that plunged her family into Prayer Baptist. She bravely recounts:
 • Her early life under manipulative church leaders.
 • The profound struggles of questioning authority as a teenager.
 • The devastating impact of an early pregnancy and traumatic miscarriage.
 • Her courageous journey of escaping familial sexual abuse.
 • And the relentless judgment and unrealistic expectations she faced.
This isn't just a story of survival; it's a testament to unbreakable resilience. Barb reveals her path from deep trauma to profound healing, highlighting the transformative relationships and the crucial role of finding the right kind of support and counsel outside the church's shadow.
Join us for a powerful, eye-opening conversation about self-discovery, personal light, and the enduring quest for true freedom.
Don't miss this inspiring episode. Share it to help others find their light!
#ReligiousTrauma #CultSurvivor #ChurchAbuse #SexualAbuseSurvivor #HealingJourney #Escape #Freedom #Judgment #Miscarriage #Resilience #SelfDiscovery #Podcast #TraumaRecovery #FindingLight #SupportSystem #MentalHealth #UnfilteredStory #Inspiring #SurvivorStories #TheProcessOfHealing

episodes.title: Survivors Unrestrained: Sent Away at 12! Tabitha's SHOCKING Tranquility Bay Nightmare!
episodes.description:
WARNING: This episode contains graphic descriptions of child abuse, neglect, and institutional trauma. Listener discretion is advised.
Imagine being 12 years old, sent away by your own parents, and trapped for years in a place that promised help but delivered a nightmare. This week on "Un-holier Than Thou" we sit down with the incredibly brave Tabitha, a survivor of the notorious Tranquility Bay facility in Jamaica – a dark chapter of the Troubled Teen Industry (TTI).
Tabitha pulls back the curtain on the appalling conditions, severe punishments, and shocking neglect she endured for four and a half years. She reveals the physical and emotional toll this "program" took on her, and the resilience it took to survive.
But Tabitha's story doesn't end there. She has transformed her pain into powerful purpose, founding 'Survivors Unrestrained' – a non-profit dedicated to supporting others affected by these programs.
Tune in to hear her harrowing journey from control to freedom, the vital importance of community in healing, and the ongoing battle to bring justice and support to countless survivors. This is more than a story; it's a call to action.
Don't miss this essential conversation. Share it to shine a light on the hidden realities of the TTI.
#TranquilityBay #TroubledTeenIndustry #TTI #SurvivorsUnrestrained #SurvivorStory #ChildAbuse #InstitutionalAbuse #Neglect #TraumaHealing #Advocacy #Justice #Podcast #TrueCrime #Resilience #HealingJourney #Jamaica #BreakTheSilence #Unbelievable #Shocking #SupportSurvivors

episodes.title: Spilling the Kool-Aid: Alisha's SHOCKING Cult Escape & Journey to Freedom!
episodes.description:
WARNING: This episode discusses sensitive topics including cult dynamics, manipulation, and emotional abuse. Listener discretion is advised.
You won't believe what she survived. 🚨 This week, get ready for a raw, eye-opening conversation as we welcome special guest Alisha, a brave survivor who was born and raised in a cult-like religious environment!
You might know Alisha from TikTok, where she fearlessly shares her story. Now, she's "Spilling the Kool-Aid" with us, detailing the chilling manipulative practices of the cult leader and the emotional and mental struggles she endured for years.
Hear her gripping account of:
Her initiation into the controlled world of the cult.The pivotal moments that sparked her awakening.The incredible, harrowing journey to her eventual escape and reclaiming her freedom.Alisha's mission today? To bring urgent awareness to those still trapped in similar communities and to help countless others heal from their experiences. This isn't just a story; it's a powerful look into the dark realities of cult dynamics and the inspiring path toward recovery and self-discovery.
Don't miss this essential episode! Share it to help others break free.
#CultSurvivor #CultAwareness #ReligiousCult #MindControl #Escape #Freedom #TraumaHealing #SelfDiscovery #Podcast #TrueCrime #Manipulation #SpillingTheKoolAid #TikTokSurvivor #HealingJourney #BreakFree #UnbelievableStory #MustWatch #SEO

episodes.title: BORN INTO A CULT: Kim Kelley's SHOCKING Escape & Fight Against Child Trafficking!
episodes.description:
You won't believe this story. 🚨 This week on Unholier Than Thou, we're honored to welcome special guest Kim Kelley, a courageous survivor who was born and raised inside an international religious cult notorious for severe child abuse and trafficking.
Kim pulls back the curtain on the chilling reality of growing up in a highly controlled environment, the shocking abuse she and her siblings endured, and the incredible true story of how she ultimately escaped.
Today, Kim dedicates her life to combating child exploitation and trafficking, working directly with law enforcement and implementing vital training programs. In this powerful conversation, Kim provides:
Unflinching insight into the prevalence of child abuse within religious organizations.The immense challenges of addressing these hidden issues.Practical steps communities and individuals can take to protect children, especially in the vulnerable digital realm.This episode is a raw, eye-opening look into the ongoing fight against child exploitation in the United States. Prepare to be informed, inspired, and moved to action by Kim's unwavering resilience and hope.
#CultSurvivor #ChildAbuseAwareness #ChildTrafficking #ReligiousCults #KimKelly #UnholierThanThou #Podcast #TrueCrime #Advocacy #ChildProtection #SurvivorStory #MentalHealth #JusticeForChildren #EndChildExploitation #SafeChurch #DigitalSafety #MustListen #Clickbait #SEO #HumanRights

episodes.title: LOST Family, GAINED Freedom: The Unbelievable Price of Escaping a Patriarchal Cult
episodes.description: In this captivating episode, we welcome Tamara Buchanan, known as Jezebel on social media, sharing her extraordinary journey from life in a strict Apostolic Pentecostal cult to becoming an advocate and speaker. Tamara recounts her upbringing, the moment she decided to reclaim the name Jezebel to empower herself, and the harrowing experiences of sexual and domestic abuse she endured. She discusses the control mechanisms within the religious cult, the manipulation of biblical scriptures, and the absence of support from her family and church community. Tamara’s resilience shines as she describes her fight for freedom, the traumatic impact on her mental health, and her relentless quest for personal healing and empowerment. Despite losing contact with her family, Tamara found liberation and now uses her platform to shed light on the issues of trauma, patriarchy, and misogyny. She also shares her journey of weight loss and self-discovery, showing that survival can lead to thriving. Her powerful poems and reflections underscore her unwavering spirit and commitment to helping others find their voice and freedom from abusive environments. #jezebel #unholier #healing #religion #religioustrauma #trauma #church

episodes.title: Escaping the Shadows: Brad's Journey of Healing from IFB Trauma
episodes.description:
In this deeply moving and powerful episode, hosts Susie and Jenny sit down with Brad, a former IFB member and pastor's kid, to delve into his harrowing experiences of abuse and his long journey towards healing. Brad shares his story of being molested by a church deacon's son, the denial of justice by his own father, and the subsequent challenges he faced growing up in such a troubling environment. He opens up about the trauma, the impact on his relationships, and how he found his path towards recovery with the support of compassionate figures in his life, including an understanding pastor and a dedicated therapist. Brad also discusses his eventual departure from the IFB and how he rebuilds his faith and finds peace. His story is not just about enduring great pain but also about finding resilience and hope. This episode is a beacon of support for survivors and a call to action for those entangled in abusive environments. Tune in to hear Brad's courageous journey and his message of healing and strength.



#ReligiousTrauma #Exvangelical #Deconstruction #ChurchToo #IFB #PastorKids #SurvivorStory #ChildAbuse #HealingJourney #MentalHealthMatters #SpiritualAbuse #BetrayalTrauma #BreakingTheSilence #TraumaRecovery #UnholyTruths #FaithAfterTrauma #Advocacy

episodes.title: The SHOCKING Reality of New Beginnings Girls Academy: A Survivor Speaks Out!
episodes.description:
In this episode, we delve into Samantha's powerful and heart-wrenching story at New Beginnings Girls Academy. Samantha recounts her journey from a troubled childhood, marked by familial conflicts and self-harm, through her traumatic experiences at the academy. She speaks candidly about the abuse and mistreatment she endured, the flawed educational system, her multiple attempts to escape, and the unrelenting emotional struggles she faced. Despite her suffering, Samantha's resilience shines through as she now dedicates her time to researching and raising awareness about the abusive practices in similar institutions. Join us as we hear Samantha's story of survival and her ongoing fight to shut down these harmful establishments.

#NewBeginningsGirlsAcademy #TroubledTeenIndustry #SurvivorStory #InstitutionalAbuse #ChildAbuse #TeenAcademy #BoardingSchoolSurvivors #TraumaHealing #BreakingTheSilence #AbuseAwareness #MentalHealth #Resilience #Podcast #UnholierThanThou #HelpSurvivors #ShutThemDown #EscapeStory #SelfHarmAwareness

episodes.title: Inside the Troubled Teen Industry: Dan Engleman's Harrowing Bethel Academy Nightmare!
episodes.description: In this episode of our podcast, we are joined by Dan Engleman, a former cadet of Bethel Boys Academy. Dan shares his deeply personal and harrowing experiences from his time at the academy between 1995 and 1997. Adopted at a young age due to his biological parents' struggles with addiction, Dan details the challenges he faced in his early years, leading to his placement in Bethel Boys Academy. He recounts the severe mistreatment and violence he endured and the impact it had on his adolescent and adult life. Dan also discusses the importance of parental support and the lasting trauma from feeling abandoned. Tune in to hear Dan's story of resilience and how he and fellow survivors support each other through a dedicated Facebook group. This eye-opening conversation sheds light on the shocking realities of the troubled teen industry and the need for better alternatives and thorough research for any parents considering such programs. #BethelBoysAcademy #TroubledTeenIndustry #SurvivorStory #ChildAbuse #InstitutionalAbuse #BoardingSchoolSurvivors #TraumaHealing #Podcast #TrueCrime #YouthPrograms #ParentalWarning #Resilience #BreakingTheSilence #AbuseAwareness #TeenAcademy

episodes.title: Blue: Deconstructing Religion, Gender Identity, and Mental Health
episodes.description:
In this powerful episode, we welcome special guest Blue to share their deeply personal and transformative story. Blue delves into their upbringing in a strict evangelical household and discusses how growing up in a religious cult setting shaped their early life experiences. This conversation explores Blue's journey through deconstructing deeply ingrained beliefs, coming to terms with their non-binary identity, and #managing dissociative identity disorder (DID). Highlights include discussions on overcoming a fear-based religious upbringing, the importance of open and accepting dialogue about gender and sexuality, and learning to love oneself amid #trauma and societal pressure. Blue's insights offer a beacon of hope and understanding for those navigating similar paths. Tune in for an enlightening and heartfelt discussion on embracing one's true self.

#powerful #religion

episodes.title: The Sobering Truth: Happiness Hill's Brainwashing & Johnna's Unbelievable Story (TTI)
episodes.description: In this emotional yet sometimes funny and light-hearted episode, we sit down with Johnna, a survivor from Happiness Hill, a troubled teen home. Johnna shares her harrowing experience of growing up in an abusive household, dealing with undiagnosed ADHD, and the challenges she faced at Happiness Hill. From being misdiagnosed and unjustly labeled as a drug addict to enduring horrific abuse and strict religious oppression, Johnna’s story is a powerful testament to resilience. She discusses the psychological trauma, the rigid rules, and the forced labor that the girls at Happiness Hill endured. Now pursuing a career in psychiatric nursing, Johnna is dedicated to helping others by conducting an in-depth survey on the impacts of institutionalization on mental health. This episode is a deeply moving exploration of survival, accountability, and the journey toward healing. #trauma #sobriety #religion #tti #religioustrauma

episodes.title: Church Life: How the Sausage is REALLY Made (Pastor's Kids Spill ALL!)
episodes.description:
You think you know church life? THINK AGAIN!🤫 Ever wonder "how the sausage is REALLY made" behind the scenes? This week on Unholier Than Thou, Jenny and Susie — both pastor's kids themselves — are spilling ALL the tea on the unspoken, unfiltered realities of growing up in ministry! 🤯
 
Get ready for eye-opening stories of chaos, drama, and shocking hypocrisy that regular churchgoers never see. From unpaid ministry roles to cutthroat church politics, secret scandals, and the exhausting pressure of always putting on a "perfect face," we're pulling back the curtain on the darker side of church life.

Join us for raw personal traumas, unexpected hilarious anecdotes, and a completely fresh perspective on what truly happens when the cameras are off and the sermon is over. This isn't your grandma's Sunday school!

Prepare to have your perception of the pulpit forever changed!

#ChurchExposed #PastorKids #PKLife #UnholyTruths #ChurchScandals #ReligiousTrauma #BehindTheScenes #Hypocrisy #MinistryLife #Christianity #Deconstruction

episodes.title: From Darkness to Light: Dan Edwards' Inspirational Journey of Survival & Redemption
episodes.description: In this emotionally riveting episode of our podcast, we sit down with Dan Edwards, a survivor of the Bethal Boys Academy under Lester Roll Off Enterprises. Dan sheds light on his harrowing experiences, including the trauma he faced at a young age and the extreme environment of the academy. He details how severe punishments, psychological suffering, and forced labor shaped his early life, leading him down a dark path filled with anger, hate, and crime. However, Dan's journey didn't end there. After hitting rock bottom, he found the strength to turn his life around, becoming a pastor and establishing HFS Ministry, a nonprofit organization dedicated to helping veterans, addicts, and the homeless. Join us as we uncover Dan's remarkable transformation from a life of despair to one of hope and service. #Survival #Redemption #Inspiration #Podcast #IBLP #BethalBoysAcademy #ChildAbuse #healingjourney  #nonprofit  #Support #faith

episodes.title: Sacred Scars: When the Hand That Feeds Also Hurts
episodes.description:
In this powerful and emotional episode, we welcome Dave, a popular TikTok content creator, as he shares his raw and inspirational life story. Raised Baptist by a preacher father, Dave recounts his childhood filled with religious zeal, parental neglect, and severe abuse, including molestation by a man living in his home. Despite these hardships, Dave's resilience shines through as he navigates his complex relationship with faith, which ultimately led him from Christianity to becoming an outspoken atheist. He also discusses his ongoing work in the religious trauma community online, particularly through TikTok, where he helps others who have suffered similar fates. This episode is a deep dive into how one man's traumatic past has fueled his mission to advocate for others and shed light on the darker side of religious institutions. Join us for this heartfelt conversation, and don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe. #preacher #abuser #religion #taylorswift #Trauma #sacred #sacredscars #tiktok #FPY

https://theprocessofhealing.com/

episodes.title: TikTok Live: Empowering Survivors: Trey's Law and the Journey to Justice
episodes.description:
Join us for a powerful and heartfelt discussion that David & Susie had on a TikTok LIVE where we delve into the significance of Trey's Law and the personal story of a survivor named Suzanne. Recently featured in a video testimony for the Texas Senate, Suzanne shares the emotional and challenging journey of advocating for legal reform to support survivors of sexual assault. The conversation covers the impact of statute limitations, the role of NDAs in sexual assault cases, and the importance of using one's voice to create change. Suzanne's deeply personal recount of her childhood trauma and her pursuit of justice serves as a beacon of hope and empowerment for fellow survivors. Tune in to learn more about Trey's Law and the ongoing fight for the rights of survivors.
#survivors #tiktok #youtube #live
Tiktok: theprocess_podcast
https://treyslaw.org/

episodes.title: Under The Umbrella Rebellion: Dee's Harrowing Journey Through Cult & Control
episodes.description: In this week's episode, we are joined by the incredible Dee from The Umbrella Rebellion Podcast. Dee shares her personal journey from being involved in the Institute in Basic Life Principles (IBLP) under Bill Gothard's cult, through her struggle with an abusive marriage, to ultimately finding her path to freedom and healing. Dee's story covers her upbringing in a Catholic family, the transition to a Baptist church, and her involvement with both the Independent Fundamental Baptist (IFB) church and the military. She also speaks extensively on the dangers of extreme fundamentalist teachings, her experiences within these groups, and the challenges she faced along the way. Join us as Dee reflects on her empowering journey, offering resources and hope to those in similar situations. Don't miss her insights on breaking free from oppressive systems, building a supportive community, and finding your own path to healing. #CultSurvivor #ReligiousTrauma #HealingJourney #UmbrellaRebellion #DeeStory #PodcastGuest #FreedomFromOppression

episodes.title: Unpacking Cult Dynamics: The ABCs of Manipulative Groups
episodes.description:
In this episode of the 'Unholier Than Thou' podcast, Susie and Jenny dive into the intricacies of cult dynamics and their shared experiences growing up in a manipulative religious environment. They discuss terminology like 'love bombing,' the inconsistencies they witnessed within their communities, the tactics used to control members, and the personal impacts of these environments. The conversation also extends to the broader implications for people questioning their involvement in potentially cult-like groups. Tune in for a candid discussion revealing the often hidden aspects of cult practices and their ripple effects on individuals.
#cult #religion #exposing

episodes.title: Escaping the Mormon Church: Becky's Journey of Overcoming Religious Trauma
episodes.description: In this powerful and emotional episode, we welcome Becky, a former member of the Mormon Church, to share her deeply personal experiences and the lasting impact of religious trauma. Becky dives into her upbringing within the church, her struggles with purity culture, and the emotional toll of sexual abuse. She candidly discusses the secrets and controversial practices of the church, the challenges she faced, and her journey towards healing and self-acceptance. Join us as Becky offers insights into her deconstruction process and the path to finding her true self beyond the confines of organized religion. This conversation is both eye-opening and inspirational for anyone grappling with similar experiences or seeking understanding and support.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Eric Skwarczynski from Preacher Boys: From Fundamentalism to AdvocacyEpisode
episodes.description:
In this episode, we sit down with Eric Skwarczynski, the creator of the Preacher Boys podcast. Eric shares his journey growing up in the Independent Fundamental Baptist (IFB) movement, his experiences of finding faith and disillusionment, and the pivotal moments that led him to start his podcast focused on #exposing abuses within the IFB community. We discuss the complex and emotional aspects of deconstructing fundamentalist beliefs, the impact of the 'Let Us Pray' documentary, and the broader cultural implications of these stories. Join us for this in-depth conversation filled with emotional insights, personal anecdotes, and a look into the power of survivor-focused storytelling. #storyteller #podcast  #preacherboyspodcast

https://www.youtube.com/@PreacherBoys

episodes.title: Purity Culture's Dirty Secrets: Hypocrisy in the Church Exposed
episodes.description: Welcome to 'Unholier,' our podcast on the pervasive influence of religious indoctrination and cult-like judgments. In this episode, it's just us delving deep into the concept of Purity Culture. We discuss how it impacts not just church visits or Bible reading but seeps into every facet of life, especially for women raised in specific religious environments like the Independent Fundamental Baptist (IFB) church. We recount personal stories and examine the oppressive nature of Purity Culture, its expectations, and its long-lasting effects on relationships and self-worth. Join us for an eye-opening discussion filled with humor, candid experiences, and even some surprising revelations about noted figures like Joshua Harris. Perfect for anyone looking to understand the genuine implications of growing up in such restrictive environments and seeking a more balanced perspective. Subscribe for more conversations about religious indoctrination and its impact on our lives. #UncoverTheTruth #PurityCulture

episodes.title: Rescued from Isolation: John Moody's Fight for Justice After Bethel Boys Academy Horrors
episodes.description: In this episode, hosts Susie and Jenny sit down with John Moody, who recounts his traumatic experiences at the Bethel Boys Academy. John shares his backstory of being sent to the academy at the age of 12 due to behavioral issues and outlines the severe abuse and neglect he faced there, including physical violence, forced labor, and emotional manipulation. He details his resilience, the impact of these experiences on his later life, and the eventual reunion with other survivors of Bethel. The conversation also touches on broader issues within the troubled teen industry and the lack of oversight for such facilities.

episodes.title: They Tried to Silence Her: Sabrina's Harrowing TTI & Adoption Story
episodes.description:
In this episode, hosts Susie and Jenny welcome Sabrina, a survivor of the troubled teen industry and abusive adoption practices. Sabrina shares her harrowing experiences in multiple troubled teen facilities and the abuse she faced. She also delves into her advocacy work, including speaking before the Senate Finance Committee and collaborating with Paris Hilton's 1111 Media, aiming to reform the way vulnerable children are treated. Sabrina recounts her personal journey of reconnecting with her siblings, finding her biological family, and her efforts to break the cycle of abuse by being a positive and engaged parent. Her story highlights resilience, courage, and the importance of ongoing advocacy.
#TroubledTeenIndustry #TTISurvivors #AdoptionAbuse #ReformTTI #BreakingCodeSilence #ChildAdvocacy #SurvivorStories #MentalHealthAwareness #ParisHilton1111Media #UnholierThanThou

episodes.title: Kidnapped, Abused, Escaped. Nate Dunn Breaks his Silence on Troubled Teen Industry
episodes.description: In this powerful episode, hosts Susie and Jenny sit down with Nate Dunn, who shares his harrowing experiences within the troubled teen industry. Nate delves into his early life trauma, including an abduction at seven years old, and his time at abusive facilities like Victory Ranch and Bethel Boys Academy. Despite years of suffering and subsequent struggles with addiction and incarceration, Nate reveals his turning point towards recovery and the importance of support networks. This emotional and inspiring conversation highlights the resilience of the human spirit and the critical need for awareness and reform in the treatment of troubled youth. #Podcast #TrueStory #troubledteenindustry #tti #survivor

episodes.title: From Public Shaming to Freedom: Jenny's Journey Out of the IFB's Grip
episodes.description: In this episode, the host welcomes Jenny as she shares her harrowing journey growing up in the Independent Fundamental Baptist (IFB) movement. Jenny's story details her family's deep roots in IFB, the strict and oppressive rules she faced, and the challenges of living under a legalistic and controlling environment. She recounts traumatic experiences, including a public shaming at youth camp, and a disastrous, abusive marriage arranged within the IFB framework. Despite the adversity, Jenny discusses how she sought therapy, found her confidence and sexuality, and eventually escaped the confines of abuse, rebuilding her life. The conversation also touches upon her current views on religion, her relationship with God outside of organized religion, and her path to greater self-awareness and healing. Finally, the episode ends on a lighter note with rapid-fire questions about her newfound discoveries and experiences after leaving the IFB.

episodes.title: They Tried to Break Her: Susie Spencer's Harrowing TTI Story & the Fight for Justice
episodes.description: In this episode, we delve deep into the complex relationship between justice and forgiveness, focusing on how these concepts are often manipulated within the legal and religious systems. We explore the pressures victims face to forgive their perpetrators and the consequences of such pressures. Cases within the Southern Baptist Convention highlight the misuse of forgiveness to silence victims and protect offenders. The episode also touches on personal experiences, societal implications, and the true, freeing essence of forgiveness.

episodes.title: Unholier Than Thou: The Secrets They Tried to Bury (And Why We're Exposing Them)
episodes.description: Welcome to the explosive debut of Unholier Than Thou, a new podcast from the Surviving Network! In this premiere episode, host David Keck from The Process of Healing introduces you to Jenny Smith and Susie Spencer, the fearless voices behind this groundbreaking series. We're pulling back the curtain on the hidden horrors of the IFB, the Troubled Teen Industry (TTI), and other religious cults, revealing the secrets they desperately tried to bury. Hear firsthand accounts of survival, resilience, and the unwavering pursuit of truth. Get ready to challenge everything you thought you knew. This is more than a podcast; it's a revolution. #UnholierThanThou #ReligiousTrauma #TTI #Exvangelical #CultRecovery #SurvivorStories
